title: [Health] New findings suggest an unintended benefit from expanding the office-based mental healthcare workforce: reductions in crime. Ten additional offices in a county reduces crime by 1.6 crimes per 10,000 residents, as well as reduces crime costs per capita by 2.2%.

[Neuroscience] Cortical thickness abnormalities in patients with post-traumatic stress disorder: A vertex-based meta-analysis shows The superior temporal gyrus and right superior frontal gyrus may play an important role in the pathogenesis of PTSD
